resources.name: apps-sdk-mcp-server
resources.title: Building an MCP Server
resources.description: Guide for implementing a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that exposes tools and data sources to AI apps using the OpenAI Apps SDK.

resources.name: apps-sdk-custom-ux
resources.title: Building Custom UX for AI Apps
resources.description: Instructions for creating custom user experiences and interactive components within AI apps using the OpenAI Apps SDK.

resources.name: random-companies-widget
resources.description: Renders an interactive UI showcasing the random companies returned by openai_app_creator_get_company_list.

resources.name: chatapp-card-web-component
resources.description: Web Component that renders a card that can be used in apps/widgets.

resources.name: chatapp-carousel-web-component
resources.description: Web Component that renders a carousel that can be used in apps/widgets.

resources.name: chatapp-header-web-component
resources.description: Web Component that renders a header that can be used in apps/widgets.

resources.name: widget-base-component
resources.description: Base component that does all the heavy lifting around Alpine and OpenAI host.

resources.name: widget-css
resources.description: Base CSS with multi theme support.
